page.title: 19EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Finally,we thought it would be helpful to try and sum up what we think about our village and the surrounding countryside.As you can see it is growing at the moment and may become a bit too big for some people in the next few years. The people who live here do a variety of jobs from engineering in precision hydraulics to electronics,from banking and insurance and chemical research at the nearby Coal Board establishment to a wide range of work for the Government Communications Headquarters a few miles away. The community would seem to be reasonably prosperous and content having time to show its humour:- there is a notice outside one large house stating"Blind dog and deaf cat-- please drive carefully."
